mapper.insert: insert into MemberInformation (m_id, m_user, m_password, m_name, m_sex, c_id, c_phone, d_id, p_id, p_photo, e_id, j_id, m_qq, status, r_admission_date, r_tuihui_date, p_remarks) values (#{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rAdmissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rTuihuiDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{pRemarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update MemberInformation set m_user = #{mUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_password = #{mPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_name = #{mName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, m_sex = #{mSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_phone = #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, p_photo = #{pPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, j_id = #{jId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, m_qq = #{mQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_admission_date = #{rAdmissionDate,jdbcType=DATE}, r_tuihui_date = #{rTuihuiDate,jdbcType=DATE}, p_remarks = #{pRemarks,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update MemberInformation set m_password=#{m_password} where m_user={m_user}
update MemberInformation set photo=#{photo} where m_id=#{m_id}
update MemberInformation set status=#{status} where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select m_id, m_user, m_password, m_name, m_sex, c_id, c_phone, d_id, p_id, p_photo, e_id, j_id, m_qq, status, r_admission_date, r_tuihui_date, p_remarks from MemberInformation where m_id = #{mId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select m_id, m_user, m_password, m_name, m_sex, c_id, c_phone, d_id, p_id, p_photo, e_id, j_id, m_qq, status, r_admission_date, r_tuihui_date, p_remarks from MemberInformation

select m.m_id,m_user,m_name,m_sex,p_photo,m_qq,m.status,r_admission_date,m.p_remarks,c.c_name,c_headmaster_name,c.c_phone,d.d_name,p.p_name,e.e_name,j.j_name from MemberInformation m join ClassTable c on c.c_id=m.c_id join DepartmentType d on d.d_id=m.d_id join PositionType p on p.p_id=m.p_id join ExchangeTable e on e.e_id=m.e_id join Jurisdiction j on j.j_id=m.j_id where m.status=#{status} and m.m_name like concat('%',#{m_name},'%')

select m.m_id,m_user,m_name,m_sex,p_photo,m_qq,m.status,r_admission_date,m.p_remarks,c.c_name,c_headmaster_name,c.c_phone,d.d_name,p.p_name,e.e_name,j.j_name from MemberInformation m join ClassTable c on c.c_id=m.c_id join DepartmentType d on d.d_id=m.d_id join PositionType p on p.p_id=m.p_id join ExchangeTable e on e.e_id=m.e_id join Jurisdiction j on j.j_id=m.j_id where m.status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
select count(*) from MemberInformation where status like concat('%',#{status},'%')
select m_id,m_name from memberinformation where status='true' and p_id=#{pId}
select m_user,m_name,d_id from memberinformation where m_user like concat ('%',#{mUser},'%')
